mapper.insert: INSERT INTO logans_task (task_name, module_name, req_method, req_uri, ans_type, ans_rate_type, out_queue, log_source, unique_field) VALUES (#{taskName}, #{moduleName}, #{reqMethod}, #{reqUri}, #{ansType}, #{ansRateType}, #{outQueue}, #{logSource}, #{uniqueField})
mapper.select:
SELECT id, task_name taskName, module_name moduleName, req_method reqMethod, req_uri reqUri, ans_type ansType, ans_rate_type ansRateType, out_queue outQueue, log_source logSource, unique_field uniqueField FROM logans_task WHERE 1 = 1
AND task_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{taskName}, '%')
AND module_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{moduleName}, '%')
AND req_method LIKE CONCAT('%', #{reqMethod}, '%')
AND req_uri LIKE CONCAT('%', #{reqUri}, '%')
AND ans_type = #{ansType}
AND ans_rate_type = #{ansRateType}
ORDER BY id DESC
